EmailTemplate.name: Activate Enterprise.Send Email 1.Email #1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: NCR launches Activate Enterprise NextGen software
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://ncrevent.webex.com/mw3300/mywebex/default.do?nomenu=true&siteurl=ncrevent&service=6&rnd=0.5837164398039255&main_url=https%3A%2F%2Fncrevent.webex.com%2Fec3300%2Feventcenter%2Fevent%2FeventAction.do%3FtheAction%3Ddetail%26%26%26EMK%3D4832534b00000004138c67e94d6a8af6a77190069926876158f7250cc9b3eab7b737672a013cdc8a%26siteurl%3Dncrevent%26confViewID%3D161323712190090491%26encryptTicket%3DSDJTSwAAAAQAZdtuxOai2W9AVce9M2mxXVbuLgVUzOZs6k4U5M0CsQ2%26]]>Digital is driving a seismic shift in how financial institutions operate – your existing, traditionally siloed technologies need to integrate in a whole new way. Legacy systems make this difficult.
But with NCR’s new Activate Enterprise NextGen, it’s simple.
Using a digital first, web technology-based architecture, our new ATM software delivers the simplicity and agility you need to transform your ATMs into a trusted access point for extended, digital banking services.
Join our webinar to hear how it can simplify your channel—straight out of the box. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
